recipe.title: Spicy Chicken Soup
ingredients: 2 to 3 teaspoons northern Thai chile powder
3/4 lb skinless boneless chicken breast, cut into 1 1/2- by 1/4-inch strips
1 to 2 tablespoons nam pla (Asian fish sauce; preferably Thai)
1 cup loosely packed fresh cilantro leaves
instructions: Bring stock to a simmer in a 3- to 4-quart saucepan, then stir in chile powder (to taste) and shallots and simmer, uncovered, 2 minutes. Add chicken and simmer until just cooked through, about 2 minutes. Stir in fish sauce (to taste) and soy sauce and simmer 1 minute. Remove from heat and stir in mint.
Serve soup warm, topped with scallions and cilantro.
